name: Pawitchaya Chaloeijanya
summary:
A passionate software developer that likes DevOps and Infrastructure Engineering.
I also like to learn new technologies and improve myself to do Full-stack too.

1.title: Teaching Assistant
1.summary: Giving advices for the students of Computer Programming 1 course, evaluating students' coursework and developing tools to ease other teaching assistants.

2.title: Google Developers Student Club Core Member
2.summary: Organizing and running tech-related events in the campus grounds such as talks and workshops. Managing offical GDSC social account by writing and publishing posts.

3.title: SOS 11th Camp Lecture Team Lead and Website Developer
3.summary: Providing learning materials and teaching Python basics for freshman students. Creating a website that hosts coding exercises for the event.

1.title: WongNung, a Community-based Movie Review Website
1.summary: A project done for the Individual Software Development Process course. I am responsible as a Full-stack developer, DevOps engineer and maintainer for the production server.

2.title: SOS 11th Camp Website
2.summary: A website for SOS 11th Camp which hosts coding exercises. I am responsible for frontend development and DevOps.
